CustomField.description: BODEV-76: Formula to show the calculated MRR discount % on the Latest DoA record.
CustomField.formula:
/* BODEV-673 Updated to show Contraction % in case of Renewal/Upsell with Contraction */
IF( ISBLANK( Latest_DoA__c ), NULL, IF( ISBLANK(Latest_DoA__r.Contraction_ARR__c), Latest_DoA__r.ARR_Discount__c, Latest_DoA__r.Contraction_Percent__c ) )
CustomField.label: DoA ARR Discount
